name: Sakeworld
description:
Welcome to Sakeworld.
Treat the ladies nice and you will be rewarded.
Run and gun to get those weapons and ammo or your done!
Punch your way out of a crowd and then empty your clip.
Throw a grenade, or use a special attack to help keep a cool and level head.
Use the foreground and background to your advantage or you will get smoked.
Beat em up, but be smart, the Mysterious Dr Sake awaits.
Sakeworld is an alternate dimension, so you know things are about to get weird.
Only you can set things right and clean up these streets!

Play as some of your favorite Rappers!
D Savage
Chief Keef
Trippie Redd
Rucci
Yung Bans

Play Exclusive and Fresh music from tons of Artists with NO additional downloads.
Featuring: Chief Keef, D Savage, Fenix Flexin, Yung Bans, 600 Breezy, Rucci, White John, Yung Weej, Grizzy, and Hoodrich Pablo Juan

Traverse through 16 levels depicting 6 Unique environments.

Visit Sakeworld and help bring peace.

Close the App when you need to and Continue your game from the start of the level you last entered at any time!

Keep track of your personal High Scores!

Download Sweet Sake Wallpapers for your device directly from the app.

Enjoy the witty humor and art style of Jack Phoenix, lovingly brought to life by Sakeworld Productions and Meta 3D studios.
